ISSUE.TITLE: Parameter to force overwriting the vocabulary in loadvoc command
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Suggested by @niko2342 in #516: The `loadvoc` command could have a parameter such as `--replace`, `--overwrite` or `--force` that would replace the existing vocabulary instead of trying to update it and preserve subject IDs.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #560 from NatLibFi/issue547-config-toml-format Support TOML as a configuration file format alongside CFG/INI.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Add --force parameter to loadvoc to force replacing the vocabulary. Fixes #526
